p: The antioxidant potential of an ethanolic extract from A. abrotanum herb was tested using the DPPH method. The results of the study showed moderate antioxidant activity of the plant extract. The IC 50 value for the extract was 284.5 µg/mL, compared with the ascorbic acid control, for which the IC 50 was 17.34 µg/mL [ 40].
